end - to - end question - focused multi-.name: AMANDA
end - to - end question - focused multi-.from sentence: In this work , we propose an end - to - end question - focused multi-factor attention network for document - based question answering ( AMANDA ) , which learns to aggregate evidence distributed across multiple sentences and identifies the important question words to help extract the answer .

AMANDA.from sentence: Intuitively , AMANDA extracts the answer not only by synthesizing relevant facts from the passage but also by implicitly determining the suitable answer type during prediction .
